------=_NextPart_000_0040_01C0824F.C3856360
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Magmatron::

    "Yes, please take a seat," Magmatron said, looking over =
the table. The lights brightened at his look. Then he began his speach.
   =
 "Now, we have reformed. You will all be given quarters, and we will be tak=
ing things at a much more....agressive tone. We have made relations with th=
e Alliance. And from what Cerberus has shown me, they are quite powerful, w=
e are not able to take them on directly.
    "Our first target, though, wil=
l be the remaining Predacons. Scanners have reported a big ship landing nea=
rby, and if they get organized they will be quite, well, more worthy oppone=
nts then they are."
    He started to walk around to all of them. "Good, we=
 have Destrons capable of flight, that can be a great source of attack. I w=
ould like to introduce you to a mainstay in out army. Nightmares, Dachande,=
 Preatorian, and Jynx, please step up." ::They step up:: "These our the mor=
e powerful warriors I have created, Beast Mode." ::They transform to Beast =
Mode::  "As you will notice they all have almost the same Beast Mode, meani=
ng that they would be hard to notice one in a crowd. Ahh, but they are in n=
eed of powerful Sparks to control them. I am one, but then another, for mor=
e direct battle control, is needed. They will command this new body." ::A p=
anal opens from the right of Magmatron and in it is the Queen, she raises h=
er head and stares at the other Destrons, then she hisses and shows off her=
 inner mouth:: "A magnificent, isn't it? I admire it's perfection, it has n=
o fear, no reason to fear. But back to the subject at hand. The Cybertronia=
n Fire is under attack by the Alliance, well, they are at a cease fire. The=
y are quite weak now, the Maximals. But, the Predacons are not organized at=
 all. Then there are the smaller groups, the Mafia, the Stunticons, the sma=
ller Maximal groups, we could easily take them out. I shall take your quest=
ions now."
    Before anybody says anything Magmatron interupts. "Ohh, and =
one more thing, Optimus Prime, the 'great' Autobot leader, is among us on t=
his planet. He has been changed to darkness by some unseen force, I wish to=
 know more, If you see him, do not engage, just watch."
